title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the Eagles impressive win over the Vikings and what he likes about Philadelphia so far this season. He doubles down on his defense of Jimmy Garoppolo and why they're a better team with him as the starting quarterback. He gives you his Herd Hierarchy of the top 10 NFL teams after week 2 of the NFL season. Plus, Nick Wright from First Things First joins the show to talk about Russell Wilson's struggles with the Broncos and why Colin's wrong about Trey Lance. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
